metadata.name: 16.1.a Percentage of persons who believe that Poland is a safe place to live
metadata.goal: Goal 16. Peace, justice and strong institutions
metadata.priority: Increase in effectiveness of the state and its institutions for social and economic enhancement and inclusion
metadata.definition: Percentage of respondents who answered affirmatively to the question: 'In your opinion, is Poland a safe place to live?'.
metadata.methodology: The indicator comes from the survey Current problems and events conducted on a randomly selected group of approximately 1000 residents of Poland. Possible answers were: Yes; No; It is hard to say.
